tldr: The `libyml` crate is no longer maintained, as indicated by the developer. Its last commit documents that `libyml` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `libyml` package from your application. Please take a look at libyaml-safer instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
